question:
to go

I am going to the park.
answer:
ir

va, vas, va, vamos, vais, van

Voy a ir al parque.

question:
much, many, a lot (adv)

I have a lot of work.

to want, love

I want to eat a pizza.
answer:
querer

quiero, quieres, quiere, queremos, queréis, quieren

Quiero comer una pizza.

question:
first

He is the first one to arrive.

thing

The thing is very interesting.
answer:
la cosa, pl. cosas

La cosa es muy interesante.

question:
city

The city is very big.
answer:
la ciudad, pl. ciudades

La ciudad es muy grande.

question:
street

The street is full of people.
answer:
la calle, pl. calles

La calle está llena de gente.
